about_the_game: Rumor has it that the mysterious agent C.Viper was investigating the Mishima Zaibatsu when she was captured. Jin took an interest in her battle suit and had the Mishima Zaibatsu fashion one for his personal use.
detailed_description: Rumor has it that the mysterious agent C.Viper was investigating the Mishima Zaibatsu when she was captured. Jin took an interest in her battle suit and had the Mishima Zaibatsu fashion one for his personal use.
